entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:15 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:53 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. High minus 9. Forecast issued 5:53 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:53 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
